title: Common metadata
description: Metadata that may be required by all downstream repositories

title.title: manuscript title
title.description: The title of the article being submitted

abstract.title: manuscript abstract
abstract.description: The abstract of the journal article being submitted

journal-title.title: journal title
journal-title.description: The title of the journal the article is being submitted to

volume.title: journal volume
volume.description: The volume of the journal the article is being submitted to

issue.title: journal issue
issue.description: The issue of the journal the article is being submitted to

ISSN.title: journal ISSN
ISSN.description: The ISSN and/or the E-ISSN of the journal the article is being submitted to (comma-separated)

publisher.title: journal publisher
publisher.description: The publisher of the journal the article is being submitted to
